summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the establishment of a mental health program to provide care for City residents unable to pay or provide the full cost of such care, and to provide Public Health Nurses who perform outreach services to mental health patients with psychiatric consultation assistance, authorizing contracts with Seattle mental Health Institute, Highline-West Seattle Mental Health Center, Mental Health North, Harborview Medical Center and Community Psychiatric Clinic, Inc. in connection therewith and making an appropriation from the Federal Shared Revenue Fund.
